an6.26:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā mahākaccāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.26:1.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṃ.
an6.26:1.7: Yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo anubuddho sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ cha anussatiṭṭhānāni.
an6.26:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an6.26:2.4: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.26:2.5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.26:2.7: Sa kho so, āvuso, ariyasāvako sabbaso ākāsasamena cetasā viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
an6.26:2.8: Idampi kho, āvuso, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavanti. (1)
an6.26:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, ariyasāvako dhammaṃ anussarati:
an6.26:3.3: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye ariyasāvako dhammaṃ anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.26:3.4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.26:3.6: Sa kho so, āvuso, ariyasāvako sabbaso ākāsasamena cetasā viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
an6.26:3.7: Idampi kho, āvuso, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavanti. (2)
an6.26:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, ariyasāvako saṅghaṃ anussarati:
an6.26:4.3: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye ariyasāvako saṅghaṃ anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.26:4.4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.26:4.6: Sa kho so, āvuso, ariyasāvako sabbaso ākāsasamena cetasā viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
an6.26:4.7: Idampi kho, āvuso, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavanti. (3)
an6.26:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, ariyasāvako attano sīlāni anussarati akhaṇḍāni …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikāni.
an6.26:5.2: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye ariyasāvako attano sīlaṃ anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.26:5.3: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.26:5.5: Sa kho so, āvuso, ariyasāvako sabbaso ākāsasamena cetasā viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
an6.26:5.6: Idampi kho, āvuso, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavanti. (4)
an6.26:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, ariyasāvako attano cāgaṃ anussarati:
an6.26:6.4: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye ariyasāvako attano cāgaṃ anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.26:6.5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.26:6.7: Sa kho so, āvuso, ariyasāvako sabbaso ākāsasamena cetasā viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
an6.26:6.8: Idampi kho, āvuso, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavanti. (5)
an6.26:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, ariyasāvako devatā anussarati:
an6.26:7.3: Yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā;
an6.26:7.4: mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṃvijjati. Yathārūpena sīlena … sutena … cāgena … paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā; mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī’ti.
an6.26:7.5: Yasmiṃ, āvuso, samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.26:7.6: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.26:7.8: Sa kho so, āvuso, ariyasāvako sabbaso ākāsasamena cetasā viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
an6.26:7.9: Idampi kho, āvuso, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visuddhidhammā bhavanti. (6)
an6.26:8.2: Yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo anubuddho sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ cha anussatiṭṭhānānī”ti.
